revised_title: The Effect of Occluded Gases on Thermo-Electric Properties of Bodies and Thermo-Electric Properties of Graphite and Carbon
tldr: The author investigates the effect of occluded gases on the thermo-electric properties of various materials, particularly focusing on graphite and carbon. The experiments reveal that occluded gases can significantly impact the thermo-electric properties of these materials, with oxygen and hydrogen causing changes in resistance and current flow.
